entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 04:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: W 18 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
